snippet: Since the Central Park Zoo’s famed polar bear Gus died last year, his pool has been empty, but a pair of Bronx grizzlies named Betty and Veronica are set to take his place in November.
abstract: Pair of Bronx Zoo grizzlies named Betty and Veronica are set to move to Central Park Zoo's pool of famed polar bear Gus, who died in 2013; bear exhibit is being rebuilt for grizzlies, who enjoy wading in water but are not big swimmers.
lead_paragraph: Since the Central Park Zoo’s famed polar bear Gus died last year, his pool has been empty, but a pair of Bronx grizzlies named Betty and Veronica are set to take his place in November.

headline.main: With Big Pawprints to Fill, Zoo Prepares for Grizzlies
headline.print_headline: With Big Pawprints to Fill, Zoo Prepares for Grizzlies
